answers.author: Maxwell Moline
answers.text:
Tracy,
Most RFPs have clauses that have important health requirements, the following are some examples:
http://www.pdf-finder.com/REQUEST-FOR-PROPOSAL-FOOD-SERVICE.html
http://www.ycrcenter.org/YLF_RFP.pdf
http://www.mrsc.org/rfps/K53concessions.pdf
And the following is an example of an RFP with a requirement for local food service:
http://www.pdf-finder.com/REQUEST-FOR-PROPOSAL-FOR-FOOD-SERVICE-FOR-THE-SPALDING-COUNTY-....html
I hope this helps!

author: Tracy Miller
text:
Hello.  An Alliance member is interested in receiving RFPs for food concessions that include an emphasis on providing local food sources/products and healthy eating options.  Please submit RFP's of this sort here or directly to tmiller@transformgov.org.  
Thank you in advance for your contribution.  
Tracy Miller  
Florida Regional Director  
Alliance for Innovation
title: RFP for Food Concessions
